Here's a list of the tools i've worked on so far, any help needed contact me at aaron.rainbird@ynap.com.
Drag the links into your bookmarks toolbar and click to run.

General Studio Tools

Fulcrum Super Panel - Use this to see stats about the current Fulcrum list and to filter any of the statuses.
Inject Images - Use to preview any images on the page (fulcrum + all brand sites), viewing all image types or just specific types.
Inject Images V2 - Updated version of Inject Images. Work In Progress.

NAP Site Check - Use to cycle through the NAP site for image checks.

Fulcrum Merge PIDs - Use this on a fulcrum page to get the merge pids and new pids for site transfers.

Video Department Tools

Inject Video - Run on MrP/NAP sites or Fulcrum to see images previewed against the video.

Inject Video FR Alternative - Run on MrP/NAP sites or Fulcrum to see images previewed against the video. This variant allows you to rollover the OU to see an FR.

Pid List Info Popup - Run this on a Fulcrum page. Used for getting list info into a spreadsheet.
